info.name: Simple Shop - Complete API Collection
info.description:
Collection מלא לבדיקת כל endpoints של Simple Shop

 Authentication: JWT Token
 Features: Products, Cart, Orders, Auth

**How to use:**
1. הרץ את השרת: `npm run dev`
2. הרץ את Auth → Register או Login
3. Token נשמר אוטומטית
4. כל ה-requests משתמשים בטוקן

Created: December 2025

request.description: בדיקת תקינות השרת - MongoDB, Redis, Uptime

הרשמת משתמש חדש

**Required:**
- name (string)
- email (string)
- password (string, min 6 chars)

exec: console.log('🔑 Token saved to collection variables');
console.log('⚠️ User already registered, use login instead');
pm.test('✅ Has user data', () => pm.expect(json.data && json.data.user).to.exist);
console.log('✅ Token valid for user:', json.data.user.email);

request.description:
בקשה לאיפוס סיסמה

**Required:**
- email (string)

**Note:** דוא"ל עם קישור איפוס יישלח לכתובת

exec: try { const body = JSON.parse(pm.request.body.raw || '{}'); reqEmail = body.email || ''; } catch (e) {}
console.log('📧 Reset email sent to:', reqEmail || '(unknown)');
// Dev convenience: capture resetToken if server returned it (NODE_ENV !== production)
console.log('🔑 Saved resetToken to environment/collection:', json.resetToken);
console.log('ℹ️ No resetToken in response (expected in production). Check your email.');

request.description:
איפוס סיסמה עם טוקן

**Required:**
- token (from email link) - ב-URL param
- newPassword (string, min 6 chars) - בbody

**Usage (dev/test):**
1. הרץ Forgot Password – הטוקן נשמר ב-resetToken אוטומטית
2. הרץ Reset Password – ה-URL משתמש ב-{{resetToken}}

**Production:** אם אין resetToken בתגובה, העתק מהדוא"ל והדבק ב-resetToken (environment/collection var)

request.description:
יצירת הזמנה מהעגלה

**Required:**
- shippingAddress (object with street, city, postalCode, country)

**Optional:**
- billingAddress (object with street, city, postalCode, country)
- paymentMethod: stripe (default)
- notes (string)

**Prerequisites:**
1. User must be logged in (authToken)
2. Cart must have items

exec: // Check if user is logged in
console.error('❌ No authToken found. Please login first!');
// Auto-add items to cart if empty
console.warn('⚠️ Could not check cart count');
console.log(`✅ Cart has ${count} item(s) - proceeding with order`);
console.log('⚠️ Cart is empty - auto-adding a product...');
console.error('❌ No products available. Run seed script first.');
console.error('❌ Failed to add item to cart');
console.log('⏳ Waiting 6 seconds for MongoDB sync...');
// Wait 6 seconds for cart to be saved to MongoDB (server has 5s delay)
console.log('✅ MongoDB sync complete - ready to create order');
console.error('❌ Create order failed with 400 Bad Request');
console.warn('💡 Cart is empty or invalid. Add items to cart first!');
console.warn('💡 Shipping address is invalid or missing required fields');
console.error('❌ Not logged in. Run: Authentication → Login');
